originalText.text: Since moving to the city I have been very hesitant on finding a new eye doctor. I put off the search for about a year, but when I finally decided to get my annual eye exam and found Eyes on Park. The office is very clean and about just as small as any other store in NYC but felt spacious enough for what it was. The employees were all very nice, especially Dr.Ilona Krugolets. Highly recommend.

text.text: Since moving to the city I have been very hesitant on finding a new eye doctor. I put off the search for about a year, but when I finally decided to get my annual eye exam and found Eyes on Park. The office is very clean and about just as small as any other store in NYC but felt spacious enough for what it was. The employees were all very nice, especially Dr.Ilona Krugolets. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: My fiancé and I have been going to Eyes on Park for over two years. Alway’s great service, we both love our doctors, they are incredible professionals in their field. Absolutely love the glasses they have available, every time I go they have the latest designer collections.

text.text: My fiancé and I have been going to Eyes on Park for over two years. Alway’s great service, we both love our doctors, they are incredible professionals in their field. Absolutely love the glasses they have available, every time I go they have the latest designer collections.

originalText.text: I've seen both Dr Muttreja and Dr Krugolets. Both super competent, efficient and kind. Britney is the MVP. During my most recent visit, she helped me pick out glasses that I'm really excited about and is just good people. Can't recommend this place enough!

text.text: I've seen both Dr Muttreja and Dr Krugolets. Both super competent, efficient and kind. Britney is the MVP. During my most recent visit, she helped me pick out glasses that I'm really excited about and is just good people. Can't recommend this place enough!

originalText.text: Got my new glasses and prescription sunglasses here and I am so happy with my purchases. Staff was great and very attentive!  I highly recommend to everyone!

text.text: Got my new glasses and prescription sunglasses here and I am so happy with my purchases. Staff was great and very attentive!  I highly recommend to everyone!

originalText.text: The doctor and staff were very helpful and friendly. Also helped me understand my insurance and benefits. Would definitely recommend for an eye exam!
